tcg

Class Trainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • tcg.Trainer

  • public class Trainer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a Trainer. Contains the constructor and methods to access the Trainer's properties such as activePokemon, hand and bench.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Trainer()
      Creates a new Trainer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBenchPokemon(IPokemon pokemon)
      Adds a pokemon to the Trainer's bench, maximum of 5.
      void addCard(ICard card)
      Adds a card to the hand of the Trainer.
      void changeActivePokemon()
      If the active pokemon is out of combat, select the first pokemon of the bench.
      IPokemon getActivePokemon()
      Gets the current active pokemon.

      Gets the bench of the trainer.

    • Method Detail

      • setActivePokemon

        public void setActivePokemon(IPokemon activePokemon)
        Set an active pokemon for the trainer. This will be the one used for attack the opponent.
        Parameters:
        activePokemon - the active pokemon.

      • setHand

        Parameters:

        Parameters:

      • addBenchPokemon

        public void addBenchPokemon(IPokemon pokemon)
        Adds a pokemon to the Trainer's bench, maximum of 5.
        Parameters:
        pokemon - the pokemon added to the bench.

      • addCard

        public void addCard(ICard card)
        Adds a card to the hand of the Trainer.
        Parameters:
        card - the card to be added.

      • selectAbility

        public void selectAbility(int index)
        select the ability of the active pokemon
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the attack to be selected.

      • play

        public void play(ICard card)
        Plays a card from the hand.
        Parameters:
        card - the card that is played.

      • getCard

        public ICard getCard(int index)
        Gets a card from the hand of the trainer.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the card to get.
        Returns:
        the card.

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        See if the active pokemon of the trainer is out of combat
        Returns:
        true if the pokemon is dead, false otherwise.

      • selectActivePokemonAttack

        public void selectActivePokemonAttack(int index)
        Selects an attack of the active pokemon.
        Parameters:
        index - the selected attack.

      • getSelectedAttack

        Returns:
        active pokemon.

      • changeActivePokemon

        public void changeActivePokemon()
        If the active pokemon is out of combat, select the first pokemon of the bench.
